Arithmetic - Class in <Unnamed>
This abstract class sets the framework for all other calculation classes

This constructor method randomly sets the values for both operand between 1 to 9 inclusive

This method uses a Scanner object to get an integer as answer from the user It takes no parameters

This method returns a question in the format of ( leftOperand + rightOperand = ) It takes no parameters

This abstract method requires subclasses to have a getQuestion() method

This method returns a question in the format of ( leftOperand x rightOperand = ) It takes no parameters
getQuestion() - Method in class Subtraction
This method returns a question in the format of ( leftOperand - rightOperand = ) It takes no parameters
getRightOperand() - Method in class Arithmetic
This method returns the value of rightOperand It takes no parameters

rightOperand - Variable in class Arithmetic
 

S

setLeftOperand(int) - Method in class Arithmetic
This mutator method changes the leftOperand variable to the integer parameter, if the parameter is not a valid value, leftOperand is set automatically to 1 It does not return a value
setRightOperand(int) - Method in class Arithmetic
This mutator method changes the RightOperand variable to the integer parameter, if the parameter is not a valid value, rightOperand is set automatically to 1 It does not return a value
